vote.title: This is to amend appointment A0210-2021 that appointed Sandra Chapple to the North Linden Area Commission in error. The appointment of Sandra Chapple, 3089 Pine Valley Rd., Columbus, Ohio 43219 is to serve on the Northeast Area Commission with a new term start date of November 4, 2021 and term expiration date of December 31, 2023. (resume attached).
vote.description:
Title
Â 
This is to amend appointment A0210-2021 that appointed Sandra Chapple to the North Linden Area Commission in error. The appointment of Sandra Chapple, 3089 Pine Valley Rd., Columbus, Ohio 43219 is to serve on the Northeast Area Commission with a new term start date of November 4, 2021 and term expiration date of December 31, 2023. (resume attached).
